metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000035 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
A heap-based buffer overflow exists in Info-Zip UnZip version <= 6.00 in the processing of password-protected archives that allows an attacker to perform a denial of service or to possibly achieve code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000035` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

unzip - 6.0-22ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unzip package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.0-22ubuntu1').
